alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:10PM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LAWRENCE...COVINGTON AND JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 109 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Olive to near Tilton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Mount Olive and Lone Star around 115 PM CDT. Collins around 120 PM CDT. Society Hill around 125 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bassfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
